items.sentence: Tom is scared of water and doesn't like to swim.
Tokyo is one of the largest cities in the world.
Tom speaks Japanese better than the Japanese do.
We wanted to stay outside, but it began to rain.
Can you pick up a case of beer on your way home?
Tom said that Mary wanted to eat lunch with him.
Tom doesn't know what he wants for his birthday.
Is this the first time you've flown first class?
Are you going to do your homework before supper?
Tom and Mary lay down side by side on the grass.
You should know better now that you're an adult.
My mother usually gets up before my father does.
We haven't spoken French to each other in years.
I do a lot less reading nowadays than I used to.
I didn't have a chance to go skiing last winter.
I'm not exactly sure why you want me to do that.
I'm not exactly sure why you want me to do this.
Crack the window a bit. It smells musty in here.
Tom wondered why nobody had told him about that.
I told you that I'm not a native French speaker.
